text: Can you tell me my next appointment on March 25th, 2023?
According to my records, your next appointment on March 25th, 2023 is with Dr. Kim.
Thanks. Can you also give me information about shortness of breath?
Sure. What would you like to know about?
Can you give me some possible diseases and first-aid methods?

output.name: Asthma
output.aid: Treatment may involve inhalers or nebulizers to open the airways, as well as medications to manage inflammation and prevent attacks.

output.name: Pneumonia
output.aid: Treatment may involve antibiotics, rest, and fluids to help the body fight the infection and recover.

text: Some possible diseases associated with shortness of breath are Asthma and Pneumonia. For Asthma, treatment may involve inhalers or nebulizers to open the airways, as well as medications to manage inflammation and prevent attacks. For Pneumonia, treatment may involve antibiotics, rest, and fluids to help the body fight the infection and recover.
